CPMAddPackage(
  NAME Catch2
  GITHUB_REPOSITORY catchorg/Catch2 # v2.x
  GIT_TAG c359076e8ad5d8be45a56dee013f414a5485050b
  OPTIONS "CATCH_BUILD_TESTING OFF" "CATCH_INSTALL_DOCS OFF"
          "CATCH_INSTALL_HELPERS OFF"
  EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL YES)

if(Catch2_ADDED)
  include(${Catch2_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/Catch.cmake)
endif()

ph_add_library(
  NAME ph_vendor_catch2
  TYPE INTERFACE
  LINK_LIBRARIES SYSTEM INTERFACE Catch2)
